author: ghudson
msg: Fix an "svn status -u" crash resulting from horked working copies.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c (close_directory): If our working copy
is not in sync with the repository, we may receive an open_directory
for a subdir which we have no entry for in the working copy.  If
this directory is not new and has not experienced any property or
entry changes, we will not create an entry for it in pb->statii, so
we must be careful of NULL status entries when checking if a closed
subdir was deleted or replaced.

author: ringstrom
msg: Insert cancellation points for the list (ls) command.
* subversion/libsvn_client/ls.c
(get_dir_contents): Add ctx argument and check for cancellation.
(svn_client_ls): Pass ctx to get_dir_contents.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/ls-cmd.c
(print_dirents): Add ctx argument and check for cancellation.
(svn_cl__ls): Pass ctx to print_dirents.

author: maxb
msg: from trunk to 1.1.x branch.

option to svnadmin recover.
